DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Drop naval mines at the given spacing along the given route. Each mine will descend to the given depth, and then after the given delay, arm itself. It will be triggered by the given target types, hostility, and proximity.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>drop_along_route</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Drop Along Route:</myLabel> <myToolTip>Route along which to drop mines.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Routes</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtRoutesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>drop_every</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Mine Spacing</myLabel> <myToolTip>The spacing between mines along the route.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>200</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>naval_mine</myVariableName> <myType>navalmineresource</myType> <myLabel>Naval Mine:</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>entitytypes=2:6:225:3:-1:-1:-1</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>mine_depth</myVariableName> <myType>depth</myType> <myLabel>Mine Depth</myLabel> <myToolTip>Depth to which the mine will descend and wait.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>10</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>186</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>arm_time</myVariableName> <myType>time</myType> <myLabel>Arming Delay:</myLabel> <myToolTip>Amount of time after reaching final depth to arm the mine</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>explode_within_radius</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Detonate Proximity</myLabel> <myToolTip>Target proximity that will trigger the mine to explode.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>25</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>10000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>targets</myVariableName> <myType>entitytypes</myType> <myLabel>Target Types:</myLabel> <myToolTip>Entity types that will trigger detonation of mine</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1:4:-1:-1:-1:-1:-1,1:3:-1:-1:-1:-1:-1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>hostile_only</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel>Hostile Only</myLabel> <myToolTip>Indicates that only hostile entities will trigger the mine.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
